articles.author: Cameron Faulkner
articles.title: Zelda: BOTW’s Eventide Island is one of Nintendo’s best pranks - Polygon
articles.description: Ahead of the May 12 release of The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom, we’re diving back into one of Breath of the Wild’s most notorious challenges: surviving Eventide Island.
articles.content: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild contains 120 shrines sprinkled across every section of Hyrule, many of which are out in the open, exposed to the elements on hilltops or lying dormant in a pea… [+3796 chars]
